paper_abstract: In this paper, we discuss a problem of capital budgeting in a fuzzy environment. Two types of models are proposed using credibility to measure confidence level. Since the proposed optimization problems are difficult to solve by traditional methods, a fuzzy simulation-based genetic algorithm is applied. Two numerical experiments demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm. (C) 2005 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Credibility-based chance-constrained integer programming models for capital budgeting with fuzzy parameters
